conversation.content: I'm here to support you with mental health and emotional well-being. I don't provide general knowledge or answer non-mental health related questions. Would you like to talk about how you're feeling or any emotional challenges you're facing?
I want to talk about emotional things
I specialize in mental health topics. Could you tell me more about what's on your mind?

I'm here to support you with mental health and emotional well-being. I don't provide general knowledge or answer non-mental health related questions. Would you like to talk about how you're feeling or any emotional challenges you're facing?
